channel.title: Co-owner
channel.description:
how do i make co owner rights? everybody stop posting. thanks for the help but i dont need it. i fixed ages ago. ur just bumping an old post.
and blitz u can stfu! ur bumping an old post u fag
WTF STOP POSTING!

item.title: Co-owner
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

[quote=“Yorchi elite, post:13, topic:257435”]Easy.

0 = Player
1 = Moderator
2 = Administrator
3 = Co-owner
3 = Owner
4 = Hidden Administrator[/quote]

^ This post was more useful than all the other ones combined. ^

Read full topic

item.title: Co-owner
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

[quote=“chassy13, post:8, topic:257435”]Well, we don’t want to spoon-feed him completely. But an else-if statement is like this:

if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { sendMessage("You are the owner."); } else if (playerRights == 3 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { sendMessage("You are not the owner."); }

But that is also pretty much the same as this:

if(playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { sendMessage("You are the owner."); } else { sendMessage("You are not the owner."); }[/quote]
good point, dont want to spoon feed him, and sorry but i cant help you with your packet 57 error lmfao, not that good of a coder.can you help me with changing my special bar, its the old redish yellow to green one, i hate it.

Read full topic

item.title: Co-owner
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

Well, we don’t want to spoon-feed him completely. But an else-if statement is like this:

if (playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { sendMessage("You are the owner."); } else if (playerRights == 3 && !playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { sendMessage("You are not the owner."); }

But that is also pretty much the same as this:

if(playerRights == 3 && playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME")) { sendMessage("You are the owner."); } else { sendMessage("You are not the owner."); }

Read full topic

item.title: Co-owner
item.dc:creator: @xray_veeo xray veeo
item.description:
@xray_veeo wrote:

Thats 100% true, however do you think someone who doesn’t know that 3 rights are owner and co-owner is gonna know wtf an else-if statement is?but yea that would work best, next time show an example.

Read full topic

item.title: Co-owner
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

You can also add an else-if statement to change that so it grabs the owner’s name, and if it isn’t the owner’s name then it will display it as Co-Owner.

Read full topic
